name: Get-A-Grip Chip
description: A Zippy, Grippy, Grapple-y Indie PlatformerEscape the the treacherous depths of a robotic assembly factory by piloting Get-A-Grip Chip (the premier grapple-equipped robot laborer on the market) across deadly pits of molten metal, big smashy crushers, and high-powered lasers galore! Use your grappling abilities to navigate increasingly complex levels and rescue other robots along the way.Fun to Learn, Even More Fun to MasterChip can move side-to-side, grapple to anchor points, and then launch off of them – meaning anyone can learn to play Get-A-Grip Chip. But to survive the increasingly complex arcade-style levels, you'll need a truly athletic level of practice.
